name: stg_campaigns
description: Staging model for marketing campaign data. Includes campaign attributes, performance metrics, and derived calculations like CTR, CPC, and ROAS. This model cleans and standardizes data sourced from processed Parquet files.

columns.name: Campaign_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for each marketing campaign.

columns.name: Target_Audience
columns.description: Description of the intended audience for the campaign (e.g., 'Women 45-60', 'Men 45-60', 'All Ages').

columns.name: Campaign_Goal
columns.description: The primary objective of the campaign (e.g., 'Product Launch', 'Brand Awareness', 'Increase Sales').

columns.name: Duration
columns.description: The length of the campaign in days.

columns.name: Channel_Used
columns.description: The marketing channel used for the campaign (e.g., 'Pinterest', 'Twitter', 'Instagram').

columns.name: Conversion_Rate
columns.description: The rate at which campaign interactions resulted in a desired action (e.g., purchase, sign-up), expressed as a decimal.

columns.name: Acquisition_Cost
columns.description: The total cost spent to acquire a new customer or achieve the campaign goal for the period.

columns.name: ROI
columns.description: Return on Investment for the campaign, calculated as (Gain from Investment - Cost of Investment) / Cost of Investment.

columns.name: Location
columns.description: The geographical location targeted or associated with the campaign.

columns.name: Language
columns.description: The language used in the campaign creative or targeting.

columns.name: Clicks
columns.description: The total number of clicks recorded for the campaign.

columns.name: Impressions
columns.description: The total number of times the campaign creative was displayed.

columns.name: Engagement_Score
columns.description: A metric indicating the level of user interaction with the campaign (interpretation depends on source system).

columns.name: Customer_Segment
columns.description: The specific customer segment targeted by the campaign (e.g., 'Fashion').

columns.name: Date
columns.description: The original date associated with the campaign record or event (Timestamp with Nanoseconds).

columns.name: Company
columns.description: The company running the campaign.

columns.name: CTR
columns.description: Derived Metric: Click-Through Rate, calculated as (Clicks / Impressions).

columns.name: CPC
columns.description: Derived Metric: Cost Per Click, calculated as (Acquisition_Cost / Clicks).

columns.name: ROAS
columns.description: Derived Metric: Return On Ad Spend. Often calculated as Revenue / Ad Spend. Based on sample data, appears related to ROI (ROAS = ROI + 1).

columns.name: StandardizedDate
columns.description: Derived Metric: A standardized date/timestamp field derived from the original 'Date' column, potentially timezone-adjusted or truncated (Timestamp with Nanoseconds).
